author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
title: Sheltering in place? Start your car once a week, and other basic tips
description: Being completely sedentary is bad for cars, not just people.
content:
21 with 20 posters participating, including story author
By now, it's hard to escape the severity of the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic. As more and more local and state authorities tell everyone to stay at home, traffic has declined to the point where there has been a… [+4249 chars]
